title: The Power of Habit
author: Charles Duhigg
summary: Explores the science behind habits and how they can be changed to transform lives.

title: Pinki
author: Pran Kumar Sharma
summary: Pinki is often seen with her pet squirrel named Kut-Kut.[2] The other notable characters in this comic are her neighbor Jhapatji, her friends Bhiku and Champu.
